Se le recomienda a todos los usuarios que instalaron esta versión que cambien sus contraseñas inmediatamente, y que se actualicen a la nueva versión segura, que es la 4.3. English A malicious version of the Cuevana Stream add-on (4.2) was uploaded to the Cuevana website and distributed to many of its users. This version takes form data and sends it to a remote location with malicious intent. It is recommended that all users who installed this version to update their passwords immediately, and update to the new safe version, version 4.3.
